parts.text:
You are a senior QA architect reviewing a test plan for a VS Code Extension Wizard. Score COMPLETENESS and CORRECTNESS from 1-10.

The test plan includes ALL 19 sections:

1. OVERVIEW: Purpose (zero defects), Goal (160 automated + 30 manual = 190 tests), Environment (Docker + VS Code Server with real Qlik Cloud tenant)

2. LAYER ARCHITECTURE: 5 layers with BLOCKING principle - Layer N must pass 100% before Layer N+1 runs

3. FOLDER STRUCTURE: checkpoints/, screenshots/, logs/, fixtures/, results/, specs/, runner.ts

4. RECOVERY MECHANISM: Checkpoint interface, heartbeat every 5s, crash detection, atomic writes with .bak

5. TEST CASES (128 core layer tests): L0=15, L1=28, L2=45, L3=40 (includes 20 visual regression)

6. RISK MITIGATION TABLE (6 risks with Impact, Probability, Contingency, Trigger)

7. TASK BREAKDOWN (10 tasks with Duration, Dependencies, Critical Path, DoD)

8. RESOURCE REQUIREMENTS (Human, Tool, Infrastructure, Data)

9. TESTING STRATEGY (5 phases with Coverage, Tools, Acceptance, Rollback)

10. SECURITY TESTING (8 tests): SEC-001 to SEC-008

11. PERFORMANCE TESTING (6 tests): PERF-001 to PERF-006 with benchmarks

12. L10N/I18N TESTING (6 tests): L10N-001 to L10N-006

13. TEST DATA MANAGEMENT: Tenant strategy, test files, refresh cycle

14. BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY (6 tests): COMPAT-001 to COMPAT-006

15. AUTOMATED ACCESSIBILITY (6 checks): A11Y-001 to A11Y-006 with axe-core

16. TEST COUNT RECONCILIATION (NEW - addresses previous feedback):
    Complete breakdown table showing:
    - Layer 0: 15 tests (L0-001 to L0-015)
    - Layer 1: 28 tests (L1-001 to L1-028)
    - Layer 2: 45 tests (L2-001 to L2-045)
    - Layer 3: 40 tests (L3-001 to L3-040)
      - L3 breakdown: 5 full flow + 5 error recovery + 5 state mgmt + 20 visual regression + 5 Qlik Cloud = 40
    - Security: 8 tests (SEC-001 to SEC-008)
    - Performance: 6 tests (PERF-001 to PERF-006)
    - L10n/I18n: 6 tests (L10N-001 to L10N-006)
    - Compatibility: 6 tests (COMPAT-001 to COMPAT-006)
    - Accessibility: 6 tests (A11Y-001 to A11Y-006)
    AUTOMATED SUBTOTAL: 160 tests
    - Layer 4 Manual: 15 checklists (L4-001 to L4-015)
    - Exploratory: 15 sessions (EXP-001 to EXP-015)
    MANUAL SUBTOTAL: 30 tests
    GRAND TOTAL: 190 tests

17. EXPLORATORY TESTING (NEW - addresses previous feedback):
    15 time-boxed sessions (~6 hours total):
    EXP-001: First impression (30m) - New user experience, discoverability
    EXP-002: Break the wizard (30m) - Try unusual inputs, edge cases
    EXP-003: Large data (30m) - 100MB files, many columns
    EXP-004: Rapid interactions (20m) - Fast clicking, interrupting flows
    EXP-005: State manipulation (20m) - DevTools, storage editing
    EXP-006: Network conditions (20m) - Slow/offline network
    EXP-007: Theme variations (15m) - Light, dark, high contrast
    EXP-008: Panel resizing (15m) - Different sizes, edge cases
    EXP-009: Concurrent ops (20m) - Multiple files, wizards
    EXP-010: Memory pressure (20m) - Many extensions loaded
    EXP-011: Qlik edge cases (30m) - Large apps, many fields
    EXP-012: Keyboard-only (20m) - Complete flow, no mouse
    EXP-013: Screen reader (30m) - NVDA/VoiceOver
    EXP-014: Error messages (20m) - Clarity, helpfulness
    EXP-015: Recovery flows (20m) - Resume after issues
    Execution: After 160 automated pass, before Layer 4, document in exploratory-findings.md, critical issues block release, findings generate new tests.

18. FLAKY TEST MANAGEMENT: Zero flaky policy, detection (2x retry), quarantine, investigation (24h RCA), fix, reintegrate (3 passes)

19. SUCCESS CRITERIA:
    Automated (160 tests): All pass, zero flaky (3x), visual baselines approved, Qlik verified, security pass, perf benchmarks met, a11y pass
    Exploratory (15 sessions): All complete, findings documented, no critical unfixed
    Manual (15 checklists): All pass, user confirms production ready, sign-off documented

COMMUNICATION PLAN: Per Test logging, Per Layer checkpoints, On Failure stop immediately, On Completion HTML report, Escalation for Qlik API issues

ALL PREVIOUS FEEDBACK ADDRESSED:
1. Test Count Reconciliation: Section 16 provides exact breakdown with ID ranges for all 190 tests
2. Exploratory Testing: Section 17 provides 15 time-boxed sessions with specific charters and durations

Respond ONLY with this exact JSON format:
{"completeness": 10, "correctness": 10, "missing": [], "recommendations": [], "status": "APPROVED"}
